level.text: Noise emanating from explosives shall be prohibited during the hours specified in this section irrespective of its compliance with ยง 2701 of Chapter 27 of this subtitle.

No blasting with explosives shall be performed on any Sunday or legal holiday or at nighttime on weekdays, except by special permit as provided in ยง 1301 of the Second Amendment to the 1972 Building Code of the District of Columbia (Title 12 DCMR).

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 5 of the District of Columbia Noise Control Act of 1977, D.C. Law 2-53, 24 DCR 5293, 5310 (December 30, 1977).
